content:
FILE_WRITTEN:src/main.py
DIR_STATE:["src/__init__.py", "src/api_server.py", "src/artifact_gate.py", "src/build_logging.py", "src/build_paths.py", "src/build_runner.py", "src/build_steps.py", "src/cli.py", "src/codebook.py", "src/config.py", "src/data_models.py", "src/demo_run.py", "src/discovery.py", "src/doi_pipeline.py", "src/evaluation.py", "src/exporters.py", "src/id_convention.py", "src/id_mismatch_checker.py", "src/id_schema.py", "src/id_system.py", "src/io_formats.py", "src/io_utils.py", "src/loaders.py", "src/logging_setup.py", "src/logging_utils.py", "src/main.py", "src/meta_analysis.py", "src/meta_utils.py", "src/mismatch_checker.py", "src/models.py", "src/plotting.py", "src/provenance.py", "src/routing_policy.py", "src/run_meta_analysis.py", "src/run_pipeline.py", "src/schema_utils.py", "src/schemas.py", "src/storage.py", "src/threshold_sweep.py", "src/uncertainty_signals.py", "src/validate_annotations.py", "src/validator.py", "src/verify_build_artifacts.py"]
Summary: wrote a runnable CLI that loads JSONL data, retrieves passages, verifies claims with quote alignment plus deterministic checks, calibrates a threshold on held-out items, and writes decisions and per-claim audit logs.
